data.cn: 拾取医疗箱，回复生命值
data.us: Take First Aid Kit to restore health

data.cn: 长按按钮蓄力，伤害更高哟
data.us: Hold the charging button for more damage

data.cn: 击败敌方玩家能够获得大量积分
data.us: Get more score by defeating enemies

data.cn: 注意躲避敌人的雪球和技能
data.us: Watch and dodge enemies’ abilities and attacks
Increase you damage by leveling up

data.cn: 升级会变大！移速和攻速会下降
data.us: Leveling up will make you bigger! Movement speed and attack speed will decrease

data.cn: 团队模式：团队积分决定团队名次
data.us: Team mode: Team score determines your team rank

data.cn: 积分决定名次，名次越高奖励越高
data.us: Your score determines your final rank. You will get a better award for a higher rank

data.cn: 团队积分决定名次，名次越高奖励越高
data.us: Your team’s score determines you final rank. You will get a better award for a higher rank
Get more score by picking up snows on the ground
Each attack will consume your score

data.cn: 使用技能可造成更高伤害
data.us: Make more damage by using your abilities
Get “Meteor Barrage” by slaying the ULTRA BEAR

33001.cn: 释放一股冰雪能量，对周围的目标造成伤害，并将其冰冻。被冰冻的目标无法移动，持续3秒。
33001.us: Release the energy of ice to freeze nearby enemies,dealing damage and rooting them.

34001.cn: 开启防御护盾，吸收一定量伤害，在护盾内所有友方单位所受到的伤害由自身承担。
34001.us: Start the protection system,creating a shield around you that absorbs damage for you and all allied players.

35001.cn: 施放一团烟雾，并消失进入隐形状态。在烟雾中免疫所有范围技能；但离开烟雾后，受到范围攻击将会脱离隐形。在烟雾状态下，刺客自身还会获得一定的伤害加成（其他角色在烟雾中没有任何效果）。脱离烟雾之后，隐形效果会持续一小段时间。
35001.us: Release a fog near you to become invisible for a short duration while gaining movement speed.You can immune all the abilities and gain bonus damage while staying in the fog. You can still be invisible after a short period when you leave the smog.

36001.cn: 对目标造成伤害。每命中目标一次，将获得一点连击点数；当连击点积累到5点后，下一次普通攻击附带额外伤害。
36001.us: Deal damage to target.Every time you hit one target you add one stack.With 5 stacks,your next basic attack will have bonua damage.

38001.cn: 激起一股冰锥旋风，对周围的目标造成持续高额伤害。
38001.us: Deal heavy damage to nearby enemies.

42001.cn: 使用忍术伪装为一团雪堆，伺机攻击前来拾取雪堆的玩家。
42001.us: Become camouflaged as a snow on the ground.You can charge while being camouflaged.

43001.cn: 抛出雪球攻击目标，雪球命中后会向近处的目标弹射，最多弹射2次。
43001.us: Your normal attack on one target will jump and attack the nearby enemies.

44001.cn: 向目标冲刺造成大量伤害，随后沿路径返回至初始位置，对路径上的目标再次造成伤害。蓄力将提升伤害。
44001.us: Slam straight to the position and return to the initial spot while attacking the enemies on the route both two times.Damage will increase while charging.

46001.cn: 发射一枚蕴含法力的雪球，雪球命中之后将触发爆炸效果，对范围内的目标造成伤害。
46001.us: Fire an snowball that will blast after it hits the target.

47001.cn: 长按进入蓄力状态后，选择面前矩形范围造成伤害。攻击区域随蓄力增长，同时提升伤害。
47001.us: After charging,deal damage to all the enemies in a cone.Damage will increase while charging.

48001.cn: 用大口径手枪向目标射击，命中之后将触发爆炸效果，对范围内的目标造成伤害。
48001.us: Fire a large pistol bullet which will blast in an area after it hits the target.

49001.cn: 呼叫舰队炮火支援，短暂延迟之后对指定区域进行轰炸，对范围内目标造成伤害和较久眩晕。伤害随蓄力时间增加。
49001.us: After calling the pirateship,bomb the ground to deal damage  and stun all enemies in a certain area after a short delay.Damage will increase while charging.

51001.cn: 向指定位置发射一颗重力弹，在短暂延迟之后爆炸，对范围内目标造成伤害，并将其拉回至爆炸点。
51001.us: Fire a powerful Gravity Bomb to a certain area to deal damage to all enemies and pull them back to the exploding point.

52001.cn: 较快攻击频率的火力攻击。

53001.cn: 选择攻击半径内的一个圆形区域释放冰棱，快速造成较高伤害。
53001.us: Choose an area to release a pillar of ice to deal damage to all nearby enemies.

57001.cn: 发射一枚冰晶攻击目标，射程较远。
57001.us: Fire a crystal bullet which has a longer range.

58001.cn: 长按进入蓄力状态之后，选择扇形攻击区域释放技能，并可将目标击退一段距离。
58001.us: After charging,deal damage to all the enemies in a cone and knock them back a short distance.

61001.cn: 使用冰冻的巨拳锤击地面，震击会在周围激发出一股冲击波，攻击范围内的目标。
61001.us: Punch the ground with a giant ice gauntlet which deals damage to all nearby enemies.

62001.cn: 蓄力锤击地面，在指定的位置释放冰刺，对目标造成伤害。
62001.us: Punch the ground to generate ice spikes which deal damage to the targets in certain area.

64001.cn: 长按进入蓄力状态后，大幅拉伸视野并且对地图上的一个圆形区域造成伤害。对命中的目标造成减速效果。
64001.us: After charging,increase your sight and deal damage to a circle area that you aimed for.Enemies in that area will be slowed.

65001.cn: 超远距离的狙射。长按进入瞄准状态，极大的拉伸视野。
65001.us: While charging,you can zoom out to gain sight and fire a long-distance bullet to deal great damage.

67001.cn: 开启之后，自身周围一定范围内的所有目标受到持续伤害和减速效果。
67001.us: Deal damage and slow nearby enemies.

68001.cn: 向前方发起冲锋，如果撞到目标则对其造成伤害，并使其短暂眩晕。
68001.us: Charge to a location and collides with the first enemy you hit.If you hit an enemy,you will deal damage and stun the enemy for a short duration.

110001.cn: 将冰雪能量凝聚成雪球，然后射向敌人。
110001.us: Fire an ice ball to enemy.

3001.cn: 造成伤害的4%转换成为自身的生命值
3001.us: Dealing damage heals for 4% of the damage dealt.

3002.cn: 造成伤害的8%转换成为自身的生命值
3002.us: Dealing damage heals for 8% of the damage dealt.

3003.cn: 造成伤害的12%转换成为自身的生命值
3003.us: Dealing damage heals for 12% of the damage dealt.

8001.cn: 死亡之后不会丢失积分，在1.5秒后复活，并在2秒内恢复15%生命值。冷却时间25秒
8001.us: Upon taking lethal damage,revive after 1.5 seconds and restore 15% of your maximum health in 2 seconds.Your score is reserved.CD:25 seconds.

8002.cn: 死亡之后不会丢失积分，在1.5秒后复活，并在2秒内恢复30%生命值。冷却时间20秒
8002.us: Upon taking lethal damage,revive after 1.5 seconds and restore 30% of your maximum health in 2 seconds.Your score is reserved.CD:20 seconds.

11001.cn: 对目标施加12%伤害加深效果，持续4秒
11001.us: Increase the target’s damage taken by 12% for 4 seconds.

11002.cn: 对目标施加24%伤害加深效果，持续4秒
11002.us: Increase the target’s damage taken by 12% for 4 seconds.

12001.cn: 降低目标30%移动速度，持续1.5秒
12001.us: Decrease the target’s movement speed by 30% for 1.5 seconds.

12002.cn: 降低目标50%移动速度，持续1.5秒
12002.us: Decrease the target’s movement speed by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

13001.cn: 每对一个目标造成一次伤害，降低0.3秒CD时间
13001.us: Decrease your CD by 0.3 seconds every time you deal damage to other players.

13002.cn: 每对一个目标造成一次伤害，降低0.5秒CD时间
13002.us: Decrease your CD by 0.5 seconds every time you deal damage to other players.

14001.us: Increase the radius of your AOE by 20%.

14002.us: Increase the radius of your AOE by 35%.

17001.cn: 击杀一个目标获得一层本能,每层伤害提升5%,最多叠加4层
17001.us: Everytime you slain a target,you will get one charge which stacks up to a maximum of 4.Each charge will provide you 5% more damage.

17002.cn: 击杀一个目标获得一层本能,每层伤害提升6%,最多叠加6层
17002.us: Everytime you slain a target,you will get one charge which stacks up to a maximum of 6.Each charge will provide you 6% more damage.

17003.cn: 击杀一个目标获得一层本能,每层伤害提升7%,最多叠加8层
17003.us: Everytime you slain a target,you will get one charge which stacks up to a maximum of 8.Each charge will provide you 7% more damage.

18001.us: Increase your critical strike chance by 20%.

18002.us: Increase your critical strike chance by 40%.

18003.us: Increase your critical strike chance by 60%.

19001.cn: 在造成伤害的3秒之内，持续对目标造成20%的额外伤害
19001.us: Your damage will cause the targets to bleed for 3 seconds of 20% the damage you deal in total.

19002.cn: 在造成伤害的3秒之内，持续对目标造成40%的额外伤害
19002.us: Your damage will cause the targets to bleed for 3 seconds of 40% the damage you deal in total.

21001.cn: 任何攻击命中目标之后，沉默目标2秒。5秒之内不会重复生效
21001.us: Silence the targets for 2 seconds when you strike them.The targets are immune of the same effect in 5 seconds.

21002.cn: 任何攻击命中目标之后，沉默目标3秒。5秒之内不会重复生效
21002.us: Silence the targets for 3 seconds when you strike them.The targets are immune of the same effect in 5 seconds.

23001.cn: 攻击附带震荡效果，对目标造成30%减速效果,持续1.5秒
23001.us: Each attack will have a effect of Impact,which will slow the targets by 30% for 1.5 seconds.

23002.cn: 攻击附带震荡效果，对目标造成50%减速效果,持续1.5秒
23002.us: Each attack will have a effect of Impact,which will slow the targets by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

24001.cn: 强化震荡效果，攻击叠加层数，达到6层时，眩晕敌方1.5秒
24001.us: Each attack will add 1 stack to you.At 6 stacks, your next attack will stun the targets.

24002.cn: 强化震荡效果，攻击叠加层数，达到5层时，眩晕敌方1.5秒
24002.us: Each attack will add 1 stack to you.At 5 stacks, your next attack will stun the targets.

26001.cn: 攻击附带致死效果，使目标生命值恢复能力下降60%
26001.us: Your attack will have a impact of LETHAL,which will decrease their healing effect by 60%.

26002.cn: 攻击附带致死效果，使目标生命值恢复能力下降90%
26002.us: Your attack will have a impact of LETHAL,which will decrease their healing effect by 90%.

27001.cn: 每次伤害附带15%的额外伤害

27002.cn: 每次伤害附带30%的额外伤害

29001.us: Reflects 20% damage to the damage dealer.

29002.us: Reflects 40% damage to the damage dealer.

30001.cn: 生成一道吸收伤害的寒冰护盾，护盾破损时，范围内敌人被减速20%，持续1.5秒。
30001.us: Build an ice shield that absorbs damage.When the shield breaks,slow nearby enemy by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

32001.cn: 造成自己死亡的攻击会触发寒冰护体，免疫所有伤害，持续2秒。
32001.us: Upon taking lethal damage,generate Glacial shroud which immune all the damage taken for the next 2 seconds.

32002.cn: 在寒冰护体的持续时间内，每秒恢复15%生命值。
32002.us: During the effect of Glacial Shroud,recover 15% of the maximum health every second.

37001.cn: 连击点到达5次后，下一次普攻伤害增加百分比
37001.us: After 5 consecutive attacks,the next attack will have a bonus damage.

39001.cn: 潜行状态下移动速度提高15%,持续2秒。
39001.us: Increase movement speed by 15% for 2 seconds during Assassin’s Shadow mode.

39002.cn: 潜行状态下移动速度提高30%，持续2秒。
39002.us: Increase movement speed by 30% for 2 seconds during Assassin’s Shadow mode.

40001.cn: 脱离潜行之后2秒，伤害提升30%。
40001.us: Increase damage by 30% in 2 seconds after the end of Assassin’s Shadow mode.

40002.cn: 脱离潜行之后2秒，伤害提升60%。
40002.us: Increase damage by 60% in 2 seconds after the end of Assassin’s Shadow mode.

41001.us: Increase the duration of Assassin’s Shadow by 1 second.

41002.us: Increase the duration of Assassin’s Shadow by 2 second.

54001.cn: 狙击现在可以穿透目标
54001.us: Ultra Fire can hit through objects.

55001.cn: 本次伤害没有暴击使下一次伤害的暴击几率提升16%，暴击后该效果重新开始计数
55001.us: Increase next attack’s critical strike chance by 16% if you do not have critical strike this time.The effect will reset after one critical strike.

55002.cn: 本次伤害没有暴击使下一次伤害的暴击几率提升25%，暴击后该效果重新开始计数
55002.us: Increase next attack’s critical strike chance by 25% if you do not have critical strike this time.The effect will reset after one critical strike.

66001.cn: 能够存储两次特殊技能的使用次数。
66001.us: You can store two charges for special abilities now.

1.cn:
钻石，用于购买英雄，钻石夺宝；
来源于活动奖励，钻石夺宝
1.us: Diamond: used for purchasing hero and playing Roulette.

2.cn:
经验，提升玩家等级；
来源于战斗结算
2.us: Exp: used for levelling up players during the battle.

3.cn:
金币，可购买英雄、解锁辅助技能等；
来源于战斗结算，活跃度奖励，活动奖励等，钻石夺宝
3.us: Gold: used for purchasing hero, unlock support skills and so on.

4.cn: 宝箱系统升级需要的经验
4.us: Exp required to upgrade the Treasure System.

1035.us: Role: Marksman Speciality: Long distance/Knock back.

8000.cn:
体验卡：使用后可免费使用英雄薇尔维特1天；
如果已拥有该英雄，使用后可获得200金币
8000.us: Experience Card: You can use Velvet for free for 1 day after using it

如果已拥有该皮肤，使用后可获得200金币

8015.cn:
体验卡：使用后可免费使用黑心船长皮肤：狼人中士 1天；
如果已拥有该皮肤，使用后可获得200金币

8108.cn:

4008.cn: 使用后在短时间内免疫一切伤害
4008.us: After using Shield, you will become immune to damage in a short period.

4010.cn: 使用后瞬间向前方位移一段距离，可穿越部分障碍物
4010.us: After using flash, you can teleport the player for a short distance in the direction of their movement.

4014.cn: 使用后一段时间内可任意移动穿越障碍物
4014.us: After using Ghost, you are able to go through barriers on the map for a short period. If you move after the effect disappears, you will be transported to a random position on the map.
